body.name: Alohaster HPSIZEE Aesthetic Cute Highlighters Mild Assorted Colors With Soft Chisel Tip, No Bleed Dry Fast Easy to Hold, for Journal Bible Planner Notes School Office Supplies, 6 Pack - Happiness
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 48 mins
features: SOFT MILD PASTEL COLORS: Non-neon, soft, mild and assorted colors. Easy on the eyes, not distracting, won't put you off from studying or working. Easily group things and keep them organized.
DRY FAST & NO BLEED: Water-based ink, dry quickly. Don't bleed through under proper use unless using very thin papers or pressing very hard while highlighting.
SMOOTH WRITING EXPERIENCE: Flat shape - comfortable and easy to hold without a sore hand & don't roll around while using. The free-flowing ink and the flat form allow you to write something smoothly.
PERFECT FOR DAILY USE: For journal, planner, work, study, note taking, annotating, etc., in school, university, at home, in the office and even when traveling. Great gift for families and friends.
EASY TO CARRY AROUND: Lightweight and space-saving, small enough and not bulky to carry. Highlighters come in a holder and a paper case, which you can use to hold highlighters or other small stuff.
body.description: Alohaster HPSIZEE-Series Highlighters 6-Pack Set PERFECT FOR DAILY USE - for books, printouts, notes, documents, journal, planner, bible, annotating, color-coding, work, study, etc., in school, university, at home, in the office and by traveling GREAT GIFTS - for family members, friends, students, teachers, professors, lefties, etc. SOFT COLORS: easy on the eyes, not distracting DRY FAST: water-based ink, dry quickly NO BLEED: don't bleed through under proper use EASY TO HOLD: comfortable without a sore hand SMOOTH: free-flowing ink and soft chisel tip EASY TO CARRY: small and lightweight

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PRODUCT INFORMATION TYPE: HighlighterBRAND: AlohasterSERIES: HPSIZEEPOINT TYPE: ChiselINK: Water-basedCLOSURE: Pull CapLINE SIZE: 1-4 mmWEIGHT: ‎4.2 ozDIMS: ‎5.08 x 0.47 x 0.35 inNUMBER OF PIECES: 6 Alohaster HPSIZEE-Series Highlighters 6-Pack Set PERFECT FOR DAILY USE - for books, printouts, notes, documents, journal, planner, bible, annotating, color-coding, work, study, etc., in school, university, at home, in the office and by traveling GREAT GIFTS - for family members, friends, students, teachers, professors, lefties, etc. SOFT COLORS: easy on the eyes, not distracting DRY FAST: water-based ink, dry quickly NO BLEED: don't bleed through under proper use EASY TO HOLD: comfortable without a sore hand SMOOTH: free-flowing ink and soft chisel tip EASY TO CARRY: small and lightweight

HPSIZEE-Series Highlighters With Soft Colors Have you ever had the following situations related to colors, e.g.: Some traditional highlighters with neon colors are too bright or dark for you that you can't even read what's under the colored highlights, Typical highlights in neon colors might sometimes be too overbearing for you that they might put you off from studying or working? So, based on the above mentioned and other similar concerns and problems, you might come up with some requirements and preferences of the suitable highlighters for yourself: You would prefer non-neon and mild but vibrant highlighters, which provide a soft hue that is easy on the eyes and not distracting for comfortably reading through it, keeping calm and focused, You want assorted colors to easily group things, i.e., use each color to indicate a separate part of your needs or a different topic for keeping things organized and making it easier to look at and use when doing a word or phrase search, You want softer highlighters than usual to make sure the text still stays fully visible. Then it would be a nice try to have the Alohaster HPSIZEE-Series Highlighters.

Pleasing Highlighting Experience Smooth Writing The ergonomic shape allows you to lay the highlighters between your thumb and finger without much pressure than usual highlighters and can give you the perfect angle for the chisel tip to lay flat against the page. Furthermore, the ink was free-flowing. Based on the flat shape and the property of the ink, the highlighters can provide you with a pleasing smooth multi-color highlighting experience. No Bleed The ink of the cool pastel highlighters is water-based so that it can dry quickly. It won't bleed through pages under proper use unless you're using very thin papers or pressing highlighters very hard while using. Barely Smear The most secure way to avoid smearing problems perfectly is to highlight first and then write using gel pens, ballpoint pens, etc. If you want to hand-write before highlighting, it is better to use a ballpoint pen instead of a gel pen, as the ink of a ballpoint pen dries much faster than a gel pen. Also, try to avoid pens with a tip larger than 1.0 mm as they take longer time than usual to dry and are more likely to cause smudging.

Easy to Hold While Using and to Carry Around With You in Daily Life Easy to Hold The soft color highlighters are comfortable and easy to hold without a sore hand and don't roll around while coloring because of the flat shape. Holder and Paper Case 6 soft colored highlighters come in clear transparent holder and a paper case, which you can use to hold all the highlighters together or any other small stuff. Small and Lightweight The pastel highlighters are lightweight and space-saving. They are small enough and not bulky to carry around in your purse, pencil case, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I always hated regular highlighters because the colors were always obnoxious. I had no idea there were alternatives until I found these! They are so subtle yet still highlight well. I use Hobonichi Techo planner that has super thin Tomoe River paper and these highlighters don’t bleed through.Note: the light “pink” (second from the left) comes out grey-ish. Weird, but I still love these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the colors!
reviews.reviewText: Love the colors of the highlighters, I use them all the time and they work so well. I have had them for a few months and they haven't started to dry out. The only complaint is that I wish the pinks were a little different, they look almost identical on paper. Overall, I would recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these highlighters. They don’t bleed through at all on my Bible pages. Great colors too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice change from neon colors.
reviews.reviewText: I haven't really used them much yet, but have sampled them. I don't really like the old overbearing neon colors. They will add just the right amount of highlight to draw the eye. I'm a sucker for office supplies and anything that helps me stay focused on work is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Effective and Love the Colors
reviews.reviewText: These highlighters are perfect to use in my bible. I was a little skeptical using them the first time. The highlighters are smooth and do NOT bleed through the thin bible pages. I was very please with the variety of colors. The variety of colors makes it easy to color code and keep my reading topics. The quality of the highlighters are very high. I actually look forward to reading and using these highlighters. The highlighters come in an adorable hard plastic case. However, the case mine came in does not stay closed. It is a real bummer because keeping them in this case would be a 5 star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These highlighters are perfect for bible studies! These highlighters have great pigment and have not dried out yet. I've had these for almost a year and they still are as pigmented as the first day I used them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for annotating
reviews.reviewText: I love these highlighters. They don’t bleed through the book pages and the colors are nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i love these highlighters!! super inexpensive for great quality. however the square design is a bit odd takes a bit getting used to!
